title: Pharmacia: Those Magic Arts: Revelation Special Ops, book 2
description: Resurrected dinosaurs, atomic bombs and fragrant gold are just the beginning... Pharmacia: [from the ancient Greek word pharmakeia] A drug, charm or enchantment, sometimes translated as 'magic arts.' Learn what happens to Matt during his mission in Babylon. Colonel Schindler sends Hadassah to Russia. Priscilla returns to R.S.O. Eva proves just how far a woman will go to rescue her family.
author: Precarious Yates
